statements: DELETE FROM ProductImprovements WHERE implemented = true;
DELETE FROM ProductImprovements WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ' AND implemented = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Products WHERE product_name = 'Product X';

DELETE FROM customer_ratings WHERE rating > 3 AND rating_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM product_improvements WHERE improvement_date >= '2021-06-01' AND improvement_date < '2022-01-01';
